sourcesContent:
<template>
	<van-tree-select
	  :items="items"
	  :active-id.sync="activeId"
	  :main-active-index.sync="activeIndex"
	  
	/>	
</template>

<script>
	export default{
		data(){
			return {
				items: [
				  {
				    text: '小说',				   
				    children: [
				      {
				        // 名称
				        text: '诗词散文',
				        // id，作为匹配选中状态的标识符
				        id: 1,
				      }
				    ]
				  },
				  {
					 text: '杂志',
					 children: [
					   {
						 // 名称
						 text: '知音漫客',
						 // id，作为匹配选中状态的标识符
						 id: 1,
					   },
					   {
						  text: '漫客绘心',
						  id:2,
					   },
					   {
						  text: '漫客绘意',
						  id:3,
					   }
					 ] 
				  }
				],
				activeId: 1,
				activeIndex: 0
			}
		},
		components:{},
		mounted(){
			
		},
		updated() {
			
		},
		methods:{}
	}
</script>

<style>
	.van-tree-select__item--active {
		color:#0f0;
	}
</style>
